ygData.subject: New aquaintances
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine finally reaches the area the humans will oneday name Norway, A cold chill ran down his back supports. The weather was similar to where his beast form

Lunarpine finally reaches the area the humans will oneday name 
Norway, A cold chill ran down his back supports. The weather was 
similar to where his beast form had assimilated itself so that wasn't 
the reason. His scanners showed that he was in the right place but 
there was no sign that anything had landed there recently. Over the 
next hill he heard the roar of an animal, one native to the planet. 
He approached with caution and saw a large Polar bear stuck by what 
appeared to be an electronic net generator. the more the bear 
struggled the more it was shocked. Lunarpine raised his rifle and 
blasted the generator. The bear still didn't seem very happy about 
being trapped. It charged the first thing it saw move. unfortunately 
for Lunarpine that thing was him. He didn't want to kill the beast 
after freeing it from its trap but he wasn't on the menu either. The 
bear swiped at Lunarpine knocking him off his robotic feat. The polar 
bear pounced on top of him biting and clawing for all it was worth. 
Lunarpine drew his claws and took a mighty swipe slashing the bear 
across the shoulder. the bear rolled off. The beast rose to it's feat 
and scampered off without more of a fight.

Lunarpine stood confused, he didn't hit it very hard. at least not 
hard enough to scare it off like that. He heard a voice from behind 
him.

"You're welcome" the voice said. 

Lunarpine turned to see the face of another bot, an older model than 
himself. "What did you do to it?" the wolfbot asked

"I hit it with a nutritional supplement with just a touch of stun 
juice." The bot lowered it's weapon, "Now will you tell me why you 
let it go before I could examine it?"

"You had it in a net, I thought you meant to harm it." Lunarpine 
responded with a suspicious glare in his eye

"Why don't we discuss this further inside? My name's Veratis, I'm a 
scientist from a settlement called Paradrose." The old bot had an odd 
face almost like it wasn't formed to match his beastmode. But so far 
Veratis showed no reason not to be trusted so Lunarpine followed him 
into what appeared to be a cave when in accuality it was a ship.
